title: Our go-to electrician
review:
We first hired Ashley for a second opinion on a whole house rewire, which another electrician convinced us we needed. After inspecting, he let us know that it was fully unnecessary and that we just needed a new fuse board. He saved us thousands of pounds with that first visit and he immediately became our go-to electrician.

Since then Ashley has fitted solar panels and a battery, a doorbell, new light sockets, outdoor lighting & power, a bathroom extractor fan, removed old ariels, and probably more stuff I can't remember. I can't fault him at all and have recommended him to my friends.
name: Renegade Electrical Ltd
